summary: Email correspondence between DOJ personnel regarding an OIG investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death. The OIG agents are working on their report and need help identifying Epstein's attorneys who visited him in prison, as the MCC attorney log is illegible or incomplete.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the OIG investigation; the email is about identifying his attorneys who visited him in prison.

persons.name: Colon
persons.context: One of the names that could be read from the MCC attorney log as potentially representing Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: G. Tali
persons.context: One of the names that could be read from the MCC attorney log as potentially representing Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: The sender of the initial inquiry email, working on the OIG report concerning Epstein and seeking identification of his attorneys.

connections.description: Colon is listed on the MCC attorney log as a potential attorney who visited Epstein in prison.
G. Tali is listed on the MCC attorney log as a potential attorney who visited Epstein in prison.
The Special Agent is working on the OIG report concerning Epstein's death and is investigating his prison contacts.

events.title: OIG Inquiry into Epstein's Attorneys
events.description: DOJ OIG agents request assistance in identifying Jeffrey Epstein's attorneys who visited him in prison, as part of their ongoing investigation into his death.

locations: One Battery Park Plaza, 29th Floor, New York, NY 10004 (DOJ OIG New York Field Office)
keyFacts: DOJ OIG agents are actively working on a report concerning Jeffrey Epstein's death as of June 2021.
The investigation includes reviewing the MCC attorney log to identify Epstein's attorneys who visited him in prison.
The MCC attorney log was described as either illegible or containing incomplete entries (e.g., only one name).
Two potentially identifiable names from the log were 'Colon' and 'G. Tali'.
The correspondence indicates ongoing inter-agency cooperation (between the email recipient's office and the OIG) in the Epstein investigation.
